description: Yinlin is a skilled Patroller and powerful Natural Resonator. After being suspended from her duties at the Public Security Bureau, she must now pursue hidden evils in secrecy.

descriptionLocalized.vi: Yinlin là một Patroller tài ba và là một Natural Resonator mạnh mẽ. Sau khi bị đình chỉ nhiệm vụ tại Cục An ninh Công cộng, giờ đây cô phải bí mật truy đuổi những thế lực tà ác ẩn náu.
descriptionLocalized.id: Yinlin adalah Patroli yang terampil dan Resonator Alam yang kuat. Setelah ditangguhkan dari tugasnya di Biro Keamanan Publik, dia sekarang harus mengejar kejahatan tersembunyi secara diam-diam.
descriptionLocalized.th: ยินหลินเป็นผู้ตรวจการณ์ที่มีฝีมือและเป็นผู้ใช้พลังธรรมชาติที่แข็งแกร่ง หลังจากถูกพักงานจากสำนักงานตำรวจ เธอต้องตามล่าความชั่วร้ายที่ซ่อนอยู่ในความลับ

quote: Name's Yinlin. As for what I do... Shhh, we don't talk about that in public.

quoteLocalized.id: Namaku Yinlin. Soal apa yang kulakukan... Shhh, kita tidak membicarakannya di tempat umum.
quoteLocalized.th: ชื่ออินหลิน นะ ส่วนว่าทำอะไรอยู่น่ะ... เงียบๆ ไว้ก่อน เรื่องแบบนี้ไม่ควรพูดกันในที่สาธารณะ
quoteLocalized.vi: Tên tôi là Yinlin. Còn việc tôi làm gì... Shhh, chúng ta không nói về điều đó ở nơi công cộng.

resonanceChain.name: Morality's Crossroads
resonanceChain.description: Resonance Skill **Magnetic Roar** and **Lightning Execution** deal {0} more damage.

resonanceChain.name: Ensnarled by Rapport
resonanceChain.description: Resonance Skill **Electromagnetic Blast** recovers an additional {1} "Judgement Point(s)" and {2} Resonance Energy on hit.

resonanceChain.name: Unyielding Verdict
resonanceChain.description: Forte Circuit **Judgment Strike**'s DMG multiplier is increased by 55%.

resonanceChain.name: Steadfast Conviction
resonanceChain.description: When Forte Circuit **Judgment Strike** hits a target, the ATK of all team members is increased by {0} for {1}s.

resonanceChain.name: Resounding Will
resonanceChain.description: Resonance Liberation **Thundering Wrath** deals {0} extra damage to targets with Forte Circuit's **Sinner's Mark** or **Punishment Mark**.

resonanceChain.name: Pursuit of Justice
resonanceChain.description: In the first 30s after casting Resonance Liberation **Thundering Wrath**, when Yinlin's **Basic Attack** hits a target, **Furious Thunder** will be triggered, dealing Electro DMG** equal to 419.59% of Yinlin's ATK. Every **Basic Attack** hit can trigger **Furious Thunder** 1 time, up to 4 times. This is considered Resonance Skill DMG.

skills.name: Zapstring's Dance
skills.description:
**Basic Attack**
Yinlin controls the puppet "Zapstring" to perform up to 4 attacks, dealing Electro DMG**.
 
**Heavy Attack**
Yinlin consumes Stamina to control "Zapstring", dealing Electro DMG**.
 
**Mid-air Attack**
Yinlin consumes Stamina to control "Zapstring" and perform a Mid-air Plunging Attack, dealing Electro DMG**.
 
**Dodge Counter**
Use **Basic Attack** after a successful **Dodge** to attack the target, dealing Electro DMG**.

skills.name: Magnetic Roar
skills.description:
**Magnetic Roar**
The puppet "Zapstring" deals Electro DMG** to the target, and puts Yinlin into the **Execution Mode**.
 
**Execution Mode**
**Basic Attack** and **Dodge Counter** will trigger 1 **Electromagnetic Blast** when hitting a target.
Each stage of **Basic Attack** or **Dodge Counter** can only trigger 1 **Electromagnetic Blast**, up to 4 times.
 
**Electromagnetic Blast**
Attack all targets marked with Resonance Circuit **Sinner's Mark**, dealing Electro DMG**.
 
**Lightning Execution**
Use Resonance Skill after casting Resonance Skill **Magnetic Roar** to cast **Lightning Execution** to attack the target, dealing Electro DMG**.
If Resonance Skill **Lightning Execution** is not activated in a while or this Character is switched, this Skill will be put on Cooldown.

skills.name: Thundering Wrath
skills.description: Command "Zapstring" to call for thunder to fall upon a large range, dealing Electro DMG**.

skills.name: Pain Immersion
skills.description: After using Resonance Skill **Magnetic Roar**, Yinlin's Crit. Rate is increased by 15%** for 5**s.

skills.name: Deadly Focus
skills.description: The damage of Resonance Skill **Lightning Execution** is increased by 10%** when hitting targets marked with "Sinner's Mark", and Yinlin's ATK is increased by 10%** for 4**s when this is triggered.

skills.name: Raging Storm
skills.description: Command puppet "Zapstring" to attack, dealing Electro DMG** in a large range.

skills.name: Chameleon Cipher
skills.description:
**Chameleon Cipher**
When Yinlin's "Judgment Points" is full, her **Heavy Attack** is replaced with **Chameleon Cipher**, which consumes all "Judgment Points" to attack the target, dealing Electro DMG**. When it hits a target marked with **Sinner's Mark**, the **Sinner's Mark** is replaced with **Punishment Mark**, lasting for 18**s.
 
**Sinner's Mark**
Normal Attack **Zapstring's Dance**, Resonance Liberation **Thundering Wrath**, and Intro Skill **Roaring Storm** will apply **Sinner's Mark** on hit.
**Sinner's Mark** is removed when Yinlin exits.
 
**"Punishment Mark"**
When a target marked with **Punishment Mark** is damaged, **Judgement Strike** will fall, dealing Electro DMG** to all targets marked with **Punishment Mark**. This can be triggered up to once per second.
 
**Judgment Points**
Yinlin can hold up to 100** Judgement Points.
When Normal Attack **Zapstring's Dance** hits a target, restores "Judgment Points".
Upon casting Resonance Skill **Magnetic Roar**, restores "Judgment Points".
When Resonance Skill **Electromagnetic Blast** hits a target, restores "Judgment Points".
Upon casting Resonance Skill **Magnetic Roar**, restores "Judgment Points".

skills.name: Skillful Cooking
skills.description: Has a chance to produce special dishes when cooking
